list.title: Project Lombok-Is it Still Relevant in 2023?
list.excerpt: What is Project Lombok? Have you used this magical library? With the new Java Records feature, you might wonder if Lombok is still relevant. Let's weigh the pros and cons and see if this is suitable for you.

list.title: Notes to Crack CLF-C01 AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Exam on First Attempt
list.excerpt: A quick guide to CLF-C01 AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Practice exam notes covers the introduction to all the services provided by AWS.

list.title: Replace Embedded Tomcat with Jetty or Undertow Server in Spring Boot 3
list.excerpt: This video explains how to replace the default embedded Tomcat with Jetty or Undertow servers

list.title: Schedule Task in Spring Boot Using @Scheduled Annotation
list.excerpt: Scheduling task in Spring boot using @Scheduled annotation with examples showcasing fixed rate, fixed delay, and using cron expressions.
